name: A. Lesha and array splitting
statement:
One spring day on his way to university Lesha found an array . Lesha
likes to split arrays into several parts. This time Lesha decided to
split the array into several, possibly one, new arrays so that the sum
of elements in each of the new arrays is not zero. One more condition is
that if we place the new arrays one after another they will form the old
array .Lesha is tired now so he asked you to split the array. Help
Lesha!
